General.Name: Imobiliária Construtora Grão Pará S.A.
General.Description: Imobiliária Construtora Grão Pará, S.A. engages in the construction, management, and operation of hotels. It is also involved in the tourism and real estate activities. The company was incorporated in 1960 and is based in Lisbon, Portugal.

0.Name: Dr. Abel Saturnino da Silva de Moura Pinheiro
0.Title: Chairman & CEO
